top_comments_top.body:
I ready don’t get the appeal of RGB.

but the Logitech G703 wiresless gaming mouse works great on Mac, it uses a USB dongle though.  Their bluetooth mice probably aren’t as responsive.

I dont use an RGB keyboard, i prefer my DAS mechanical keyboard.
